bug.author: julskast
bug.description:
One last bug of the Halite project! We can't get the hamburger menu to open. Steps to reproduce:
click on navigation hamburger menu Navigation flashes open then closed
Could you help us fix this last thing?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/julskast>@julskast</denchmark-link> I have just created a PR containing the fix. Please review
